Title: Overview and comparison of nonlinear interference modelling approaches in ultra-wideband optical transmission systems
Abstract: © 2019 IEEE.The recent advances in modelling nonlinear interference of systems operating beyond the C-band are discussed. Estimation accuracy as well as computational complexity of current approaches are compared and addressed.
